full_summary:
# Tender Announcement
## Title (English and French)
[English Title] NPP – S4553277 - Temporary Help Services at National Capital Region (NCR) 
[French Title] APM – S4553277 - Services d'aide temporaire de la région de la capitale nationale (RCN)

## Reference Information
* Reference Number: cb-8144-78052205
* Amendment Number: 1
* Solicitation Number: S4553277
* Publication Date: 2023-08-15
* Tender Closing Date: Not applicable (Expired)
* Amendment Date: 2023-08-18

## Brief Description of the Requirement
The Department of National Defense (DND) has a requirement for Temporary Help Services at the National Capital Region (NCR). This requirement is open only to those supply arrangement holders under EN578-172870 who qualified under the streams and categories of Stream 5 - Computer Services - Computer Application Support.

## Eligible Supply Arrangement Holders
The following supply arrangement holders have been invited to submit a proposal:
	* Altis Human Resources (Ottawa) Inc.
	* Cistel Technology Inc.
	* Dalian Enterprises and Coradix Technology Consulting, in Joint Venture
	* DLS Technology Corporation
	* Excel Human Resources Inc.
	* IBISKA Telecom Inc.
	* IPSS INC.
	* Maplesoft Consulting Inc.
	* Michael Wager Consulting Inc.
	* Mindwire Systems Ltd.
	* Orbis Risk Consulting Inc.
	* Spirit Personnel Inc.
	* The AIM Group Inc.
	* The Halifax Computer Consulting Group Inc.
	* TRM Technologies Inc.

## Level of Security Requirement
A Minimum Security Level of Secret is required for this tender.

## Contracting Entity Information
* Contracting Entity: Department of National Defense
* Address: 60 Moodie Drive, Ottawa, ON K2H8G1, Canada

## Notice URL and Supporting Documentation
* [English Version] https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8144/s4553277-method-1---rfp-%28english-version_0.pdf
* [French Version] https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8144/s4553277-method-1---dp.pdf
